Not all that thrilled with very mediocre facility and service and premium rate
I did not love the additional 30 a day for breakfast and gym use either but it was not a bad value

1: The pool was nice and its indoors so the weather was not a factor when using the facilities
The lobby was nice but chairs designed for giants and not people under 6 ft tall
I could see from day one that the hotel service has a great quality both because of its comfortable and appropriate facilities as well as service and constant concern for our comfort
We could walk most places and the hotel facilities we good
Having a Starbucks in the lobby was an added bonus
Amenities are not lacking and the rooms seemed nice and quiet
Example reading in the lobby on their surprisingly comfy blue sofas I felt as if I was almost completely alone

UPS store in the main lobby

Great location extremely comfortable mattress nice gym pool spa
Good modern accommodations in the heart of Union Square for 500 night and up
